posts.post_content:
Recently, I started trying to collect some n172s. Due to financial issues going back and forth I need to sell a few especially because two cards I need for a set popped up for auction. 

I am willing to sell or trade for a few specific cards. I will also entertain offers on all cards.

I'm looking for in any condition:
-ANY 1923-24 Billikens
-Cracker Jack Evers
-e94 Evers
-e98 Brown (all colors except orange)
-m116 Farmer Ray and Otto Krueger


For Sale
-Mattimore. (Looks to be trimmed). 
-Ryan (rebacked). 

NOW TAKE THESE TWO FOR $80

Images are available so please feel free to ask. These cards have flaws that make them more affordable, but they are still great looking cards.

[url]tlwise12@aol.com[/url]

Travis

Emaill sent on Richardson Detroit.

Joe

PM and Email sent on Baldwin and Keenan. 

Thanks,

Tom

Email sent on Kilroy and Foutz. Thanks.

George

Sent another Private message.

Please send scans of front and back of Richardson Detroit to :

[url]JMAPLES0871@CHARTER.NET[/url]

Thanks joe
